title.jp: The Queen of the GALS -- GO GO -> Kotobuki Ran

synopsis: Meet Ran Kotobuki, a sophisticated Super Gal who battles evil in her hometown of Shibuya.

title.jp: Shibuya -- Pit-A-Pat -> Great Investigation!

synopsis: Ran races to catch a purse thief but soon learns this petty criminal may not be as ordinary as she seems.

title.jp: Women`s feelings -- *thump* *thump* -> Red Mesh

synopsis: Ran is back on the case when Miyu receives a weird love letter in her locker.

title.jp: There is There is? -- There isn`t There isn`t? -> Luck with men?

synopsis: Ran questions whether a new love interest is right for her.

title.jp: Heart -- Falling Apart ->Breaking off friendship with Aya!?

synopsis: Aya begins to distance herself from her Gal life when her grades drop significantly.

title.jp: Pool -- Excitement -> Junior High Detectives!

synopsis: Ran's day at the pool may have severe consequences when the Bukuro Gals try to take over Shibuya.

title.jp: Dark Shadow -- Sound of Waves -> Miyu Targeted

synopsis: Miyu's hidden past catches up with her when she attempts to complete 100 good deeds.

title.jp: Heart -- Prick -> Miyu`s Past

synopsis: Ran is on the case when thugs from an old gang attack Miyu.

title.jp: Memories -- Worn Out -> Saya is kidnapped?

synopsis: Questions arise after Sayo, Shibuya's peacekeeper, is kidnapped.

title.jp: Yuuya -- Nervous -> Rival arrives!

synopsis: Things heat up when Ran is challenged to an intense dance competition.

title.jp: Shibuy Crossing -- Super Cool -> Grand Prix

synopsis: Things get complicated when Ran decides to hold a contest to decide whom will become her boyfriends!

title.jp: Appointment -- Farewell, the girl of swordsmanship

synopsis: Ran is forced to join Kendo Club member, Shiori, for a make-up class, but Shiori has other plans in mind.

title.jp: The Super Girl, Gentle Kotobuki

synopsis: Suspicion arises when Miyu and Aya voice their concerns about Ran's study habits.

title.jp: Maki`s shining entrance, Year one Gal

synopsis: Ran's dedication is tested when a visitor forces her to revisit her own Ironclad Rules.

title.jp: Revenge filled snowboard competition

synopsis: Ran wins a snowboard and decides to take everyone snowboarding in the summer!

title.jp: The pretty sun shines on the memorable day of love

synopsis: Miyu, who is the school's troublemaker, is put under Ran's counseling when teachers reach their wits' end with her antics.

title.jp: Feeling of shock -- Aya`s confession

synopsis: Romance is in the air when Aya considers confessing her feelings to Rei after taking a romance personality test.

title.jp: Go, Taishou battle

synopsis: Ran accepts an interesting challenge from Mami while on vacation with her friends.

title.jp: The summer girl under the sun

synopsis: Reality hits hard when Ran discovers she's broke again. But is she ready to get a job?

title.jp: Mami`s unforgettable first love

synopsis: Mami breaks up with her boyfriends and then discovers her first love is planning a visit to Shibuya.

title.jp: Victory! Charge charge! Sports meet

synopsis: Ran hatches a plan to avoid doing homework: She will compete in a festival that will earn her credit. Can she pull it off?

title.jp: Para Queen

synopsis: Rivalries and conspiracies emerge during the upcoming festival.

title.jp: We have to tear down the mask of this teacher

synopsis: Ran must stand up to Gunjo who is sore over losing the sports festival.

title.jp: The monkey is going back to Machida, Tasuki`s lost his love.

synopsis: The Gals are telling fortunes again and today happens to be Ranâ€™s luckiest day of the year, but she soon finds her unluckiest days may be near.

title.jp: Yamato really went to propose.

synopsis: It's a race against time as the Gals try to sell 3,000 pastries by the end of the day. Can they pull it off?

title.jp: Super Cop - Happening! - Ran Kotobuki!

synopsis: Ran accidentally brainwashes herself and takes on a whole new persona. Has she forgotten her Gal life for good?
